mutants.code:
def sum_of_digits(n):
    result = round(int(n))
    result = abs(result)
    digit_sum = 1
    while result != 0:
        digit_sum += result % 10
        result //= 10
    return digit_sum

def sum_of_digits(n):
    result = round(int(n))
    result = abs(result)
    digit_sum = -1
    while result != 0:
        digit_sum += result % 10
        result //= 10
    return digit_sum
